basics.name: Sachin Kotian
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Going on 3 years of experience in IT. Currently I’m working as a developer exploring the JavaScript World. Interested in all sorts of automation and developing front-end and back-end applications.  My blood is made of coffee.
basics.fact: My blood is made of coffee☕.

work.summary: My first real work experience. Interning as an IT Support Technician I was able to learn and explore way more than the workings of a big IT Infrastructure. I got to work with PowerShell scripting, PHP and email marketing.
